Vitamin D3 from Sunflower Oil


	Vitamin D (cholecalciferol) is a fat-soluble vitamin that has diverse and vital functions in the body. These mainly include the maintenance of normal bone and tooth structures and normal functions of muscles and the immune system. Often there is an insufficient supply of this essential nutrient. The daily requirement (about 4000-5000 units / 24 hours) is largely formed by endogenous synthesis from sunlight, and the smaller part by far  (200 - 800 units) is supplied by the diet. In practice, it is hard to get enough sunlight to supply our needs during winter.
	 Liquid D3 is highly concentrated with 1,000 IU per drop, so that it meets today's scientific & nutritional requirements and allows fast, easy uptake.

Recommended use:

description:
The vitamin K2 capsules by BjökoVit contain pure vitamin K2 MK7 from Natto and is suitable for both vegetarians and vegans. Each pack contains 60 capsules with a plant-based capsule shell.

What is Natto:
Small soybeans that are fermented with the help of a special bacterium (Bacillus subtilis ssp. Natto) are known as Natto. The beans are soaked in water overnight, boiled and steamed the next day and then inoculated with the bacteria. During the fermentation, the characteristic strong umami taste develops. Most importantly, Natto has a very high content of vitamin K2. Soybeans naturally contain vitamin K2, but this increases 100-fold during fermentation.

Recommended use:
Take 1 capsule per day.

These vegan vitamin K2 drops contain the biologically active all-trans-MK-7 (K2VITAL®) form. As drops, they can be dosed individually and are bioavailable to the body.


	K2 is available in different versions (MK-4 and MK-7), which differ in terms of their chemical structure. There is the "MK-4" and the "MK-7".
	The higher-quality MK-7 is divided into two further forms "cis" and "trans". Only the MK-7 trans can be properly used by the body, it is completely vegan and has the highest half-life. That is why it is important to have the highest possible “trans” share. Only products with a trans content of over 98% may be designated as "all-trans".
	HAWLIK K2 drops vegan (MK-7 All-trans) have the most valuable form that can be made available to the body and have a high bioavailability.


Consumption recommendation:
0.5 ml once a day.

	The vitamin K1 and vitamin K2 (Menaquinone-4) are synthetic. The vitamin K2 (MK-7) is extracted from the flower extracts geraniol and farnesol.

	Not intended for daily consumption.

What is Life Light® MultiAll?


	A high quality multi-spectrum vitamin for a meaningful daily supply of orthomolecular micronutrients.


How does Life Light® MultiAll work? 


	A characteristic feature is a newly developed "all in one" formula for a daily basis supply of vitamins, trace elements and minerals to complement your daily diet.
	As a special bonus, the formula also contains important vitaminoids, plant enzymes and bioactive plant compounds.


Vitamin complex




	Life Light® MultiAll is a high-quality vitamin blend with the fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E and K, as well as the water-soluble B-vitamins and vitamin C.


Functions of Vitamins:


	Vitamin A contributes to normal iron metabolism
	Vitamin A contributes to maintaining normal vision
	Vitamin D contributes to normal recovery of calcium and phosphorus
	Vitamin D contributes to maintaining normal muscle function
	Vitamin E and C contributes to protecting the cells from oxidative stress
	Vitamin K contributes to normal blood clotting
	The B vitamins contribute to energy metabolism and normal function of the immune system
	Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of blood vessels
	Vitamin C contributes to normal psychological function


Minerals and trace elements


	Trace elements are essential to life and are involved in important metabolic processes.
	Life Light® MultiAll contains a specially tuned mineral and trace element blend with potassium, manganese, zinc, selenium, chromium and molybdenum, as well as naturally bound calcium and magnesium in the optimum efficiency ratio 2: 1.
	The minerals phosphorus and sodium and the trace elements copper, iron and iodine were deliberately left out of the recipe so that Life Light® MultiAll can also be used by people with a controlled intake of these substances.


Vitaminoids- and enzyme complex


	As a special feature, Life Light ® MultiAll also contains alpha lipoic acid, L-carnitine, coenzyme Q10, and the plant enzymes bromelain and papain, and L-glutathione.
	Coenzyme Q10 (ubiquinone) is also an endogenous substance, that occurs in all cells.


Recommended Use


	Take 2 capsules with plenty of water. Take for at least 3 months, consult your doctor if you wish to take longer.


What is so special about Life Light® MultiAll?


	High-quality, hypoallergenic ingredients without additives
	1 capsule covers approximately 50% of the recommended average daily dose of the micronutrients contained (according to Directive 2008/100 / EC).
	2 capsules cover 100 percent of average daily needs. The specific dosage can be adapted with consultation from your doctor. 
	Free of allergens, lactose-, gluten- and artificial additives.


Meaningfully combined with: 
Life Light® Olive Leaf Elixir

Neofollics Hair Growth Supporting Tablets


	contain an effective combination of only the best, natural ingredients
	stimulate healthy hair growth from within
	can be used for all kinds of hair loss concerns 
	contributes to preserving normal, healthy hair growth 
	increases hair volume


The ingredients contained in the hair growth tablets are diverse

The most common form of hair loss is hereditary. This can best be addressed by suppressing the hormone dihydrotestosterone (DHT). DHT is the cause of damage to the hair follicles, which results in fewer and thinning hair follicles being produced. 

Neofollics Hair Growth Supporting Tablets contain natural extracts, such as saw palmetto extract, beta-sitosterol, nettle extract, red clover extract, ECGC and isoflavones, that inhibit the formation of DHT, stimulate hair growth and reduce hair loss.

Alongside DHT inhibitors, the formula also contains a variety of amino acids, minerals and vitamins that are important for healthy hair growth. These include L-carnitine L-tartrate, L-cysteine and taurine which improve the transport of nutrients to the roots of the hair to enhance hair growth. 

Selenium and zinc are important minerals for maintaining healthy hair. A deficiency thereof can lead to unwanted hair loss.

Biotin, an essential vitamin, leads to fuller, healthier hair when consumed in higher dosages. A deficiency thereof can lead to hair loss. It also has a positive effect on the skin and nails.

Other included vitamins essential for hair growth are vitamins B2, B3, B5 and B12.

Added benefits: 


	suitable for men and women 
	first results are noticeable after several weeks. 
	thicker, stronger hair is noticeable after about 3 - 6 months 


Dosage:


	Take 3 tablets per day with water after a meal.
	When satisfactory results have been achieved after one year, continue the treatment with a maintenance dosage of 1 to 2 tablets per day.
	Suitable for both men and women.


Note: Not suitable for use when pregnant.

Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets are a powerful and natural supplement that counteracts premature greying and promotes pigmentation. The formula targets the cause of grey hair by using a unique 2-step treatment:  

Two-phase treatment: 


	Step 1. A tablet containing a Melanin Complex™.
	Step 2. A fast-melting tablet containing Enhanced Catalase™.


This combination effectively counteracts grey hair whilst maintaining the natural hair colour. 

The Anti-Grey Hair Tablets are perfect for men and women who


	suffer from premature greying 
	would like to preserve their natural hair colour 
	would like to have thicker, healthy-looking hair 
	are looking for an effective solution that counteracts grey hair 


What are the causes that lead to grey hair? The following biological processes are responsible for grey hair: 


	If melanocytes found in the hair follicles do not produce a sufficient amount of melanin, it leads to a reduction in pigmentation.
	The reduction of the enzyme catalase leads to an increase in hydrogen peroxide. Hydrogen peroxide leads to fading of the pigments which results in discolouration.
	Increased homocysteine levels increase the amount of hydrogen peroxide.
	Glutathione peroxidase clears hydrogen peroxide. Low levels thereof contribute to greying. 


This is where the Anti-Grey Hair Tablets come into play to counteract these effects. 

Active ingredients in Anti-Grey Tablets that counteract grey hair: 


	Catalase: this is an important enzyme that plays a role in the process of grey hair. Catalase breaks down hydrogen peroxide thereby preventing grey hair. As people age, less catalase is produced in the body. By supplementing catalase in an effective way, the enzyme continues to break down the hydrogen peroxide properly. In the Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets, the catalase is found in a fast-melting tablet, to ensure that it is absorbed more effectively into the bloodstream. Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets contain 22 500 units of catalase and are, therefore, able to clear large amounts of hydrogen peroxide and prevent grey hair.  Quercetin, Copper and L-Tyrosine: these ingredients play an important role in melanin synthesis – the production of the natural pigment that gives hair its colour.
	Folic acid: decreases homocysteine, which reduces hydrogen peroxide build-up in the body.
	Vitamin B12: improves the absorption and efficacy of catalase. It also lowers homocysteine.
	Selenium: increases glutathione peroxidase, which clears hydrogen peroxide.


Active ingredients contained in the Anti-Grey Hair Tables that promote hair growth, healthy-looking hair and prevent hair loss: 


	Zinc: is a mineral that is essential for maintaining healthy hair. Zinc deficiency in the body can lead to hair loss.
	Biotin: a deficiency thereof can lead to hair loss and brittle hair. A high dose of biotin supports the growth of strong, full and healthy hair. It also improves the condition of the skin and nails.
	EGCG: a polyphenol, or epigallocatechin gallate, is not only a powerful antioxidant found in green tea but also helps stimulate hair growth.
	The tablets also contain iodine and vitamins D3, B6 & C, which are important for healthy hair growth.


Directions for use: 


	Take 1 dosage per day. A dosage is made up of 1 Step 1 tablet (yellow) and 1 Step 2 tablet (white with orange dots).
	
		Take the Step 1 tablet with or after a meal, swallowing it whole.
		Take the Step 2 tablet by placing it under the tongue to dissolve. It may take a few minutes to dissolve fully.
	
	


Best results are achieved when consuming the tablets daily. 

Content: 60 tablets (2 x 30 tablets). One month supply.

Note: Not suitable for use when pregnant.

Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets are a powerful and natural supplement that counteracts premature greying and promotes pigmentation. The formula targets the cause of grey hair by using a unique 2-step treatment:  

Two-phase treatment: 


	Step 1. A tablet containing a Melanin Complex™.
	Step 2. A fast-melting tablet containing Enhanced Catalase™.


This combination effectively counteracts grey hair whilst maintaining the natural hair colour. 

The Anti-Grey Hair Tablets are perfect for men and women who


	suffer from premature greying 
	would like to preserve their natural hair colour 
	would like to have thicker, healthy-looking hair 
	are looking for an effective solution that counteracts grey hair 


What are the causes that lead to grey hair? The following biological processes are responsible for grey hair: 


	If melanocytes found in the hair follicles do not produce a sufficient amount of melanin, it leads to a reduction in pigmentation.
	The reduction of the enzyme catalase leads to an increase in hydrogen peroxide. Hydrogen peroxide leads to fading of the pigments which results in discolouration.
	Increased homocysteine levels increase the amount of hydrogen peroxide.
	Glutathione peroxidase clears hydrogen peroxide. Low levels thereof contribute to greying. 


This is where the Anti-Grey Hair Tablets come into play to counteract these effects. 

Active ingredients in Anti-Grey Tablets that counteract grey hair: 


	Catalase: this is an important enzyme that plays a role in the process of grey hair. Catalase breaks down hydrogen peroxide thereby preventing grey hair. As people age, less catalase is produced in the body. By supplementing catalase in an effective way, the enzyme continues to break down the hydrogen peroxide properly. In the Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets, the catalase is found in a fast-melting tablet, to ensure that it is absorbed more effectively into the bloodstream. Neofollics Anti-Grey Hair Tablets contain 22 500 units of catalase and are, therefore, able to clear large amounts of hydrogen peroxide and prevent grey hair.  Quercetin, Copper and L-Tyrosine: these ingredients play an important role in melanin synthesis – the production of the natural pigment that gives hair its colour.
	Folic acid: decreases homocysteine, which reduces hydrogen peroxide build-up in the body.
	Vitamin B12: improves the absorption and efficacy of catalase. It also lowers homocysteine.
	Selenium: increases glutathione peroxidase, which clears hydrogen peroxide.


Active ingredients contained in the Anti-Grey Hair Tables that promote hair growth, healthy-looking hair and prevent hair loss: 


	Zinc: is a mineral that is essential for maintaining healthy hair. Zinc deficiency in the body can lead to hair loss.
	Biotin: a deficiency thereof can lead to hair loss and brittle hair. A high dose of biotin supports the growth of strong, full and healthy hair. It also improves the condition of the skin and nails.
	EGCG: a polyphenol, or epigallocatechin gallate, is not only a powerful antioxidant found in green tea but also helps stimulate hair growth.
	The tablets also contain iodine and vitamins D3, B6 & C, which are important for healthy hair growth.


Directions for use: 


	Take 1 dosage per day. A dosage is made up of 1 Step 1 tablet (yellow) and 1 Step 2 tablet (white with orange dots).
	
		Take the Step 1 tablet with or after a meal, swallowing it whole.
		Take the Step 2 tablet by placing it under the tongue to dissolve. It may take a few minutes to dissolve fully.
	
	


Best results are achieved when consuming the tablets daily. 

Content: 60 tablets (2 x 30 tablets). One month supply.

Note: Not suitable for use when pregnant.
